title: A 63-Year-Old Yoga Instructor's Top 3 Moves for Better Mobility | Flipboard
text: A 63-Year-Old Yoga Instructor's Top 3 Moves for Better Mobility Keep your body active and mobile in your 60s and beyond with a yogi's go-to exercises. It's a fact of life: Your body changes as you age.
